Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Game.Main
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColourThemeChanger, DifficultySelectorMenu, GameSceneLoader, LeaderboardMenu, MainMenu, OptionMenu
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
2048 Game This Main class initialize variables implemented in the program application (game) It is also responsible in starting the application in the Main Menu Scene
Since:
version 1.0 ("Initial Commit" in GitHub history)
Version:
1.6.1

    setGameRoot(javafx.scene.Group gameRoot)
    This method is used to set a gameRoot A Game Root is a root node of scene that defines how a game scene should look like This gameRoot is implemented to help users/players to distinguish which game scene they are on The UI is designed by implementing how the gameRoot should look like

  • Method Details

    • setGameScene

      public void setGameScene(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene)
      This method is used to set a gameScene A Game Scene is a scene that defines the state of the game This method helps in setting which state the player should be in. Example in this application includes: (Main Menu, Option Menu, Gameplay Menu, End Game Menu, etc...)
      Parameters:
      gameScene - Set the gameScene to current gameScene
      Since:
      version 1.0 ("Initial Commit" in GitHub history)

    • setGameRoot

      public void setGameRoot(javafx.scene.Group gameRoot)
      This method is used to set a gameRoot A Game Root is a root node of scene that defines how a game scene should look like This gameRoot is implemented to help users/players to distinguish which game scene they are on The UI is designed by implementing how the gameRoot should look like
      Parameters:
      gameRoot - Set the gameRoot to current gameRoot
      Since:
      version 1.0 ("Initial Commit" in GitHub history)

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This method starts the application and calls the displayMainMenu method to display main menu once the application has completed booting up
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - top level in JavaFX container (A window)

      version 1.0 ("Initial Commit" in GitHub history)
